Name: Ankh
Text: Saves your life once per fight

Name: Blayzee’s Boots
Text:
Acquire → +S^S^S^
You always take the advantage

Name: Dodgy Surgery
Text: +D^, but lose H^ equal to your M^

Name: Environment: Aplomb
Text: Start of fight → +3H^ to you and your opponent

Name: Environment: Disquiet
Text: You and your opponent start your fights with half H^, rounded up

Name: Environment: Razors
Text: Players can’t gain H^ and lives can’t be saved in your fights

Name: Environment: Vitality
Text: Saves your life and your opponent’s life each once per fight

Name: Find An Opening
Text:
A^1
You may play a slow move right after this

Name: Gear Fiend
Text: You can hold +3W^

Name: Lance Through
Text:
A^3
Your opponent’s life can’t be saved this fight

Name: Master Technique
Text: A^ equal to the number of Technique cards you have plus one

Name: Secret Word
Text:
+H^H^
The next time you would die this fight, your life is saved

Name: Silver-Quick
Text:
Acquire → +S^
Train → +S^

Name: Soul Lamp: Knight
Text:
Acquire → +D^
Lose a fight → +D^

Name: Soul Lamp: Thief
Text:
Acquire → +S^
Lose a fight → +S^

Name: Spiteful
Text:
Acquire → -D^
Just before you die, A^1 first

Name: Sturdy
Text:
Acquire → -S^S^
Saves your life once per fight

Name: True Bell
Text: End of rest → if you have an even number of both face up and face down cards, +M^D^S^

Name: Turtle Up
Text: +H^H^H^H^H^

Name: Vampire
Text: Swing → +H^

Name: Way of Lead
Text:
Acquire → acquire one of your face-down slow moves
Play a slow move → +H^H^
